name: AI Gym Assistant
description: A computer vision-powered personal trainer that analyzes exercise form in real-time, counts reps, and provides corrective feedback to improve workout technique.

name: Image Chat App
description: An intelligent chat application that lets users upload images and ask questions about them. Combines vision models with language models for natural visual Q&A.

name: Automated Number Plate Reading
description: A real-time vehicle number plate detection and recognition system using deep learning, capable of extracting plate text from video feeds and static images.

name: College Website Chatbot
description: An NLP-powered chatbot for NIT Trichy that answers student queries about admissions, courses, faculty, and campus facilities using retrieval-augmented generation.

name: Emotion-Adaptive Background Generation
description: Leverages Vision Transformers (ViTs) to detect human emotions in real time from webcam input and dynamically adapts the background accordingly.

name: Analytics Chatbot for Excel-Based Insights
description: Combines a RAG pipeline for descriptive insights from Excel files with a SQL engine for precise numerical data. Converts natural language queries into automated insights, running entirely offline.

name: Jarvis Jr
description: Reinvents the command-line experience by integrating NLP. Users type natural language instead of memorizing complex terminal commands and syntax.

name: Celebrity Look-Alike Model
description: Identifies the closest celebrity match by analyzing facial features. Uses face detection, alignment, and embedding-based similarity matching against a curated celebrity database.

name: DataByte Website
description: The official website for DataByte ML Club, NIT Trichy. Built with React, featuring a scientific dashboard aesthetic with live metrics, animations, and project showcase.
